validation.positive: This field must be greater than 0

currency.label: Currency
currency.hint: Set the currency with which you want to place an open bid

expiration.label: Expiration date
expiration.tooltip: Your bid will be canceled at the end of the selected period. This prevent from long running and forgotten bids.

ownership.title: Automatic ownership transfer
ownership.description: Once you purchase an NFT, the ownership will automatically be transfer to you. There is no extra actions required on your side.

form.connect: Sign in to generate your referral link

success.ended: The auction has ended with a winner ð

banner-owner.description: After that date, the auction and its bids will be canceled.

banner.description: After that date, the auction and its bids will be canceled.

banner.description: The auction has ended but the reserve price hasn't been met.

currency.label: Currency
currency.hint: Set the auction's currency with which buyers can place bids

price.label: Reserve price
price.hint: Set a specific amount for which bids below it won't win the auction

banner.title: Auction rules
banner.item1: When an auction starts, you won't be able to cancel the sale anymore. This is to provide a fair experience to the Platform users.
banner.item2: Expiration period: To prevent from long running and forgotten sales, your auction and its bids will be canceled {{validity}} after the selected end date. You can always recreate a sale at the end of the period.

validation.positive: This field must be greater than 0

currency.label: Currency
currency.hint: Set the sale's currency with which buyers can purchase

expiration.label: Expiration date
expiration.tooltip: Your sale will be canceled at the end of the selected period. This prevent from long running and forgotten sales. You can always create a new sale after it expired.

info.cancel-confirmation: Are you sure to cancel this offer?

modal-item.cancel-confirmation: Are you sure to cancel this offer?
